summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the purchase of right of way necessary for the drainage related portion of the project known as Alley, Block 10, Jefferson Park Addition, Division \#2 Paving and Drainage Project (LID 6615) and for the necessary expenses of the Law and Engineering Departments in connection with such purchase or subsequent condemnation proceedings in lieu thereof; and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
